title.en: Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu
title.raw: 《吳王濞列傳》 Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu

sentences.zh: 吳王濞者，高帝兄劉仲之子也。

translations.literal: Wu wang Bi person, Gao Di brother Liu Zhong zhi zi.
translations.idiomatic: King Wu Bi was the son of Liu Zhong, Emperor Gao's elder brother.

sentences.zh: 高帝已定天下七年，立劉仲為代王。

translations.literal: Gao Di yi ding tian xia seven years, li Liu Zhong wei Dai wang.
translations.idiomatic: Seven years after Emperor Gao pacified the realm, he enfeoffed Liu Zhong as King of Dai.

sentences.zh: 而匈奴攻代，劉仲不能堅守，棄國亡，閒行走雒陽，自歸天子。

translations.literal: Yet Xiongnu attack Dai, Liu Zhong not able jian shou, qi guo wang, xian xing zou Luo yang, self gui tian zi.
translations.idiomatic: But the Xiongnu attacked Dai, Liu Zhong could not hold firm, abandoned his kingdom and fled, secretly traveled to Luoyang, and surrendered to the emperor.

sentences.zh: 天子為骨肉故，不忍致法，廢以為郃陽侯。

translations.literal: Tian zi wei gu rou gu, not ren zhi fa, fei yi wei He yang hou.
translations.idiomatic: For the sake of flesh and blood relations, the emperor could not bear to execute him, demoted him to Marquis of Heyang.

sentences.zh: 高帝十一年秋，淮南王英布反，東并荊地，劫其國兵，西度淮，擊楚，高帝自將往誅之。

translations.literal: Gao Di eleven years autumn, Huai nan wang Ying Bu fan, dong bing Jing di, jie qi guo bing, xi du Huai, ji Chu, Gao Di self jiang wang zhu it.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn of Emperor Gao's eleventh year, King Ying Bu of Huainan rebelled, to the east annexed Jing territory, seized his state troops, crossed the Huai west, attacked Chu, Emperor Gao personally led troops to execute him.

sentences.zh: 劉仲子沛侯濞年二十，有氣力，以騎將從破布軍蘄西，會甀，布走。

translations.literal: Liu Zhong zi Pei hou Bi year twenty, have qi li, yi qi jiang cong po Bu jun Qi xi, hui Pi, Bu zou.
translations.idiomatic: Liu Zhong's son Marquis Bi of Pei was twenty years old, had strength, as cavalry general followed to defeat Bu's army at Qixi, met at Pi, Bu fled.

sentences.zh: 荊王劉賈為布所殺，無後。

translations.literal: Jing wang Liu Jia wei Bu suo sha, wu hou.
translations.idiomatic: King Liu Jia of Jing was killed by Bu, had no heir.

sentences.zh: 上患吳、會稽輕悍，無壯王以填之，諸子少，乃立濞於沛為吳王，王三郡五十三城。

translations.literal: Shang huan Wu, Hui ji qing han, wu zhuang wang yi tian it, zhu zi shao, then li Bi yu Pei wei Wu wang, wang three jun fifty three cheng.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor worried Wu and Huiji were fierce and tough, had no strong king to fill them, all sons were young, so enfeoffed Bi at Pei as King of Wu, ruling three commanderies and fifty-three cities.

sentences.zh: 已拜受印，高帝召濞相之，謂曰：「若狀有反相。」

translations.literal: Yi bai shou yin, Gao Di zhao Bi xiang it, wei yue: "Ru zhuang have fan xiang."
translations.idiomatic: After receiving the seal, Emperor Gao summoned Bi to look at him and said: "Your appearance has rebellious features."

sentences.zh: 心獨悔，業已拜，因拊其背，告曰：「漢後五十年東南有亂者，豈若邪？

translations.literal: Xin du hui, ye yi bai, yin fu qi bei, gao yue: "Han hou fifty years dong nan have luan person, qi ru xie?
translations.idiomatic: He regretted in his heart, but the appointment was already made, so he patted his back and warned: "Fifty years after Han, if there is chaos in the southeast, would it be you?

sentences.zh: 然天下同姓為一家也，慎無反！」

translations.literal: Ran tian xia tong xing wei yi jia, shen wu fan!"
translations.idiomatic: But the realm's same surname is one family, be careful not to rebel!"

sentences.zh: 濞頓首曰：「不敢。」

translations.literal: Bi dun shou yue: "Bu gan."
translations.idiomatic: Bi kowtowed and said: "I dare not."

sentences.zh: 會孝惠、高后時，天下初定，郡國諸侯各務自拊循其民。

translations.literal: Hui Xiao Hui, Gao Hou shi, tian xia chu ding, jun guo zhu hou ge wu zi fu xun qi min.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Hui and Empress Gao periods, the realm was newly pacified, commandery and kingdom feudal lords each diligently comforted and governed their people.

sentences.zh: 吳有豫章郡銅山，濞則招致天下亡命者（益）［盜］鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，以故無賦，國用富饒。

translations.literal: Wu have Yu zhang jun tong shan, Bi then zhao zhi tian xia wang ming person (yi) [dao] zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, yi gu wu fu, guo yong fu rao.
translations.idiomatic: Wu had the copper mountain of Yuzhang commandery, Bi then summoned the realm's fugitives to cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, therefore no taxes, state wealth abundant.

sentences.zh: 孝文時，吳太子入見，得侍皇太子飲博。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen shi, Wu tai zi ru jian, de shi Huang tai zi yin bo.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Wen's time, the Wu crown prince entered to see the emperor, got to serve drinking and gaming with the imperial crown prince.

sentences.zh: 吳太子師傅皆楚人，輕悍，又素驕，博，爭道，不恭，皇太子引博局提吳太子，殺之。

translations.literal: Wu tai zi shi fu jie Chu ren, qing han, you su jiao, bo, zheng dao, not gong, Huang tai zi yin bo ju ti Wu tai zi, sha it.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu crown prince's tutors were all Chu people, fierce and tough, moreover habitually arrogant, gaming, disputed the way, not respectful, the imperial crown prince pulled the gaming board and beat the Wu crown prince to death.

sentences.zh: 於是遣其喪歸葬。

translations.literal: Yu shi qian qi sang gui zang.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon he sent his coffin back for burial.

sentences.zh: 至吳，吳王慍曰：「天下同宗，死長安即葬長安，何必來葬為！」

translations.literal: Zhi Wu, Wu wang yun yue: "Tian xia tong zong, si Chang an ji zang Chang an, he bi lai zang wei!"
translations.idiomatic: Arriving at Wu, the King of Wu angrily said: "The realm is same clan, if died in Chang'an then bury in Chang'an, why necessarily come bury!"

sentences.zh: 復遣喪之長安葬。

translations.literal: Fu qian sang zhi Chang an zang.
translations.idiomatic: Again sent the coffin to Chang'an for burial.

sentences.zh: 吳王由此稍失藩臣之禮，稱病不朝。

translations.literal: Wu wang you ci shao shi fan chen zhi li, cheng bing not chao.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu from this gradually lost vassal minister's etiquette, claimed illness and did not attend court.

sentences.zh: 京師知其以子故稱病不朝，驗問實不病，諸吳使來，輒系責治之。

translations.literal: Jing shi zhi qi yi zi gu cheng bing not chao, yan wen shi not bing, zhu Wu shi lai, zhe xi ze zhi it.
translations.idiomatic: The capital knew he claimed illness because of his son and did not attend court, verified and asked truly not ill, all Wu envoys who came were arrested and punished.

sentences.zh: 吳王恐，為謀滋甚。

translations.literal: Wu wang kong, wei mou zi shen.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu feared, his plotting increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 及後使人為秋請，上復責問吳使者，使者對曰：「王實不病，漢系治使者數輩，以故遂稱病。

translations.literal: Ji hou shi ren wei qiu qing, shang fu ze wen Wu shi zhe, shi zhe dui yue: "Wang shi not bing, Han xi zhi shi zhe shu bei, yi gu sui cheng bing.
translations.idiomatic: When later sent people to request autumn audience, the emperor again questioned the Wu envoys, the envoys replied: "The king truly not ill, Han arrests and punishes envoys several times, therefore finally claimed illness.

sentences.zh: 且夫『察見淵中魚，不祥』。

translations.literal: Qie fu "cha jian yuan zhong yu, not xiang".
translations.idiomatic: Moreover 'inspecting and seeing fish in the abyss is inauspicious.'

sentences.zh: 今王始詐病，及覺，見責急，愈益閉，恐上誅之，計乃無聊。

translations.literal: Jin wang shi zha bing, ji jue, jian ze ji, yu yi bi, kong shang zhu it, ji nai wu liao.
translations.idiomatic: Now the king first feigned illness, when discovered, saw the questioning urgent, increasingly withdrew, feared the emperor would execute him, plans then helpless.

sentences.zh: 唯上棄之而與更始。」

translations.literal: Wei shang qi it yet yu geng shi."
translations.idiomatic: Only if your majesty abandons him and lets him start anew."

sentences.zh: 於是天子乃赦吳使者歸之，而賜吳王几杖，老，不朝。

translations.literal: Yu shi tian zi nai she Wu shi zhe gui it, yet ci Wu wang ji zhang, lao, not chao.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon the emperor pardoned the Wu envoys and returned them, moreover granted the King of Wu staff and mat, old, not attend court.

sentences.zh: 吳得釋其罪，謀亦益解。

translations.literal: Wu de shi qi zui, mou yi jie.
translations.idiomatic: Wu got released from his crime, plotting also increasingly relaxed.

sentences.zh: 然其居國以銅鹽故，百姓無賦。

translations.literal: Ran qi ju guo yi tong yan gu, bai xing wu fu.
translations.idiomatic: But residing in the kingdom with copper salt reasons, the people had no taxes.

sentences.zh: 卒踐更，輒與平賈。

translations.literal: Zu jian geng, zhe yu ping jia.
translations.idiomatic: When completing the military service, always gave fair value.

sentences.zh: 歲時存問茂材，賞賜閭里。

translations.literal: Sui shi cun wen mao cai, shang ci lu li.
translations.idiomatic: Seasonally visited and asked about worthy talents, rewarded and granted neighborhoods.

sentences.zh: 佗郡國吏欲來捕亡人者，訟共禁弗予。

translations.literal: Tuo jun guo li yu lai bu wang ren zhe, song gong jin fu yu.
translations.idiomatic: Other commandery kingdom officials who wanted to come capture fugitives, he petitioned together to forbid and not give them.

sentences.zh: 如此者四十餘年，以故能使其眾。

translations.literal: Ru ci zhe forty yu nian, yi gu neng shi qi zhong.
translations.idiomatic: Like this for over forty years, therefore able to command his multitude.

sentences.zh: 晁錯為太子家令，得幸太子，數從容言吳過可削。

translations.literal: Chao Cuo wei tai zi jia ling, de xing tai zi, shu cong rong yan Wu guo ke xue.
translations.idiomatic: Chao Cuo served as crown prince's household steward, got favored by the crown prince, repeatedly leisurely spoke that Wu's faults could be reduced.

sentences.zh: 數上書說孝文帝，文帝寬，不忍罰，以此吳日益橫。

translations.literal: Shu shang shu shuo Xiao Wen Di, Wen Di kuan, not ren fa, yi ci Wu yi ri heng.
translations.idiomatic: Repeatedly memorialized to persuade Emperor Wen, Emperor Wen lenient, not willing to punish, therefore Wu increasingly arrogant.

sentences.zh: 及孝景帝即位，錯為御史大夫，說上曰：「昔高帝初定天下，昆弟少，諸子弱，大封同姓，故王孽子悼惠王王齊七十餘城，庶弟元王王楚四十餘城，兄子濞王吳五十餘城：封三庶孽，分天下半。

translations.literal: Ji Xiao Jing Di ji wei, Cuo wei yu shi da fu, shuo shang yue: "Xi Gao Di chu ding tian xia, kun di shao, zhu zi ruo, da feng tong xing, gu wang nie zi Dao Hui wang wang Qi seventy yu cheng, shu di Yuan wang wang Chu forty yu cheng, xiong zi Bi wang Wu fifty yu cheng: feng three shu nie, fen tian xia ban.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Jing ascended, Cuo became imperial censor, spoke to the emperor: "Formerly Emperor Gao initially pacified the realm, brothers few, sons weak, greatly enfeoffed same surname, therefore enfeoffed bastard son Dao Hui Wang to rule Qi over seventy cities, younger brother Yuan Wang to rule Chu over forty cities, brother's son Bi to rule Wu over fifty cities: enfeoffed three bastard sons, divided half the realm.

sentences.zh: 今吳王前有太子之郄，詐稱病不朝，於古法當誅，文帝弗忍，因賜几杖。

translations.literal: Jin Wu wang qian you tai zi xi, zha cheng bing not chao, yu gu fa dang zhu, Wen Di fu ren, yin ci Wu wang ji zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Now the King of Wu previously had crown prince enmity, feigned illness and did not attend court, by ancient law should be executed, Emperor Wen could not bear it, therefore granted staff and mat.

sentences.zh: 德至厚，當改過自新。

translations.literal: De zhi hou, dang gai guo zi xin.
translations.idiomatic: Virtue extremely thick, should have reformed and started anew.

sentences.zh: 乃益驕溢，即山鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，誘天下亡人，謀作亂。

translations.literal: Nai yi jiao yi, ji shan zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, you tian xia wang ren, mou zuo luan.
translations.idiomatic: But increasingly arrogant, then mountain cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, lured realm fugitives, plotted to rebel.

sentences.zh: 今削之亦反，不削之亦反。

translations.literal: Jin xue it yi fan, not xue it yi fan.
translations.idiomatic: Now reduce it also rebel, not reduce it also rebel.

sentences.zh: 削之，其反亟，禍小；

translations.literal: Xue it, qi fan ji, huo xiao;
translations.idiomatic: Reduce it, its rebellion quick, calamity small;

sentences.zh: 不削，反遲，禍大。」

translations.literal: Not xue, fan chi, huo da."
translations.idiomatic: Not reduce, rebellion slow, calamity great."

sentences.zh: 三年冬，楚王朝，晁錯因言楚王戊往年為薄太后服，私姦服舍，請誅之。

translations.literal: Three years winter, Chu wang chao, Cuo yin yan Chu wang Wu wang nian wei Bo tai hou fu, si jian fu she, qing zhu it.
translations.idiomatic: Third year winter, Chu king attended court, Cuo therefore spoke that Chu king Wu previous year for Empress Bo mourned, privately illicit in mourning residence, requested to execute him.

sentences.zh: 詔赦，罰削東海郡。

translations.literal: Zhao she, fa xue Dong hai jun.
translations.idiomatic: Imperial decree pardoned, punished by reducing Donghai commandery.

sentences.zh: 因削吳之豫章郡、會稽郡。

translations.literal: Yin xue Wu zhi Yu zhang jun, Hui ji jun.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore reduced Wu's Yuzhang commandery, Huiji commandery.

sentences.zh: 及前二年趙王有罪，削其河閒郡。

translations.literal: Ji qian two years Zhao wang have zui, xue qi He jian jun.
translations.idiomatic: And previous two years Zhao king had crime, reduced his Hejian commandery.

sentences.zh: 膠西王卬以賣爵有姦，削其六縣。

translations.literal: Jiao xi wang Ang yi mai jue have jian, xue qi six xian.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi king Ang because selling ranks had corruption, reduced his six counties.

sentences.zh: 漢廷臣方議削吳。

translations.literal: Han ting chen fang yi xue Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Han court ministers just discussing reducing Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞恐削地無已，因以此發謀，欲舉事。

translations.literal: Wu wang Bi kong xue di wu yi, yin yi ci fa mou, yu ju shi.
translations.idiomatic: King Wu Bi feared reducing territory endless, because of this aroused plotting, wanted to raise affairs.

sentences.zh: 念諸侯無足與計謀者，聞膠西王勇，好氣，喜兵，諸齊皆憚畏，於是乃使中大夫應高誂膠西王。

translations.literal: Nian zhu hou wu zu yu ji mou zhe, wen Jiao xi wang yong, hao qi, xi bing, zhu Qi jie dan wei, yu shi nai shi zhong da fu Ying Gao tao Jiao xi wang.
translations.idiomatic: Considered feudal lords none sufficient to plot with, heard Jiaoxi king brave, liked valor, loved soldiers, all Qi feared him, thereupon sent court gentleman Ying Gao to tempt Jiaoxi king.

sentences.zh: 無文書，口報曰：「吳王不肖，有宿夕之憂，不敢自外，使喻其驩心。」

translations.literal: Wu wen shu, kou bao yue: "Wu wang not xiao, have su xi zhi you, not gan zi wai, shi yu qi huan xin."
translations.idiomatic: No written document, orally reported: "The King of Wu unworthy, has day and night worries, dares not exclude himself, sent to explain his joyful heart."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「何以教之？」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "He yi jiao it?"
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "How to instruct him?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「今者主上興於姦，飾於邪臣，好小善，聽讒賊，擅變更律令，侵奪諸侯之地，徵求滋多，誅罰良善，日以益甚。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Jin zhe zhu shang xing yu jian, shi yu xie chen, hao xiao shan, ting chan zei, shan bian geng lv ling, qin duo zhu hou zhi di, zheng qiu zi duo, zhu fa liang shan, ri yi yi shen.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Now the ruler arises from villainy, adorned by evil ministers, likes petty goodness, listens to slanderers and traitors, arbitrarily changes laws and commands, invades and seizes feudal lords' lands, demands increasingly many, executes and punishes the good and worthy, daily increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 里語有之，『舐糠及米』。

translations.literal: Li yu you it, "shi kang ji mi".
translations.idiomatic: Neighborhood saying has it, 'licking bran reaches rice.'

sentences.zh: 吳與膠西，知名諸侯也，一時見察，恐不得安肆矣。

translations.literal: Wu yu Jiao xi, zhi ming zhu hou, yi shi jian cha, kong bu de an si.
translations.idiomatic: Wu and Jiaoxi are famous feudal lords, at once seen investigated, fear cannot peacefully indulge.

sentences.zh: 吳王身有內病，不能朝請二十餘年，嘗患見疑，無以自白，今脅肩累足，猶懼不見釋。

translations.literal: Wu wang shen you nei bing, not neng chao qing twenty yu nian, chang huan jian yi, wu yi zi bai, jin xie jian lei zu, you ju bu jian shi.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu personally has internal illness, cannot attend court audience over twenty years, often troubled by suspicion, no way to clear himself, now shrugs shoulders piles feet, still fears not seen released.

sentences.zh: 竊聞大王以爵事有適，所聞諸侯削地，罪不至此，此恐不得削地而已。」

translations.literal: Qie wen da wang yi jue shi have shi, suo wen zhu hou xue di, zui not zhi ci, ci kong bu de xue di er yi."
translations.idiomatic: Secretly heard your majesty because of rank affairs had error, heard feudal lords reduced lands, crime not reach this, this fears not only reducing land."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「然，有之。

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Ran, have it.
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Yes, there is that.

sentences.zh: 子將柰何？」

translations.literal: Zi jiang nai he?"
translations.idiomatic: You will do what?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「同惡相助，同好相留，同情相成，同欲相趨，同利相死。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Tong e xiang zhu, tong hao xiang liu, tong qing xiang cheng, tong yu xiang qu, tong li xiang si.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Same evil mutually assist, same good mutually detain, same emotion mutually accomplish, same desire mutually hasten, same benefit mutually die.

sentences.zh: 今吳王自以為與大王同憂，願因時循理，棄軀以除患害於天下，億亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Jin Wu wang zi yi wei yu da wang tong you, yuan yin shi xun li, qi qu yi chu huan hai yu tian xia, yi yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the King of Wu himself considers with your majesty same worry, wishes following time complying with principle, abandoning body to eliminate calamity harm for the realm, perhaps also possible?"

sentences.zh: 王瞿然駭曰：「寡人何敢如是？

translations.literal: Wang ju ran hai yue: "Gua ren he gan ru shi?
translations.idiomatic: The king startled and alarmed said: "I dare be like this?

sentences.zh: 今主上雖急，固有死耳，安得不戴？」

translations.literal: Jin zhu shang sui ji, gu you si er, an bu de dai?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the ruler though urgent, firmly have death, how not wear crown?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「御史大夫晁錯，熒惑天子，侵奪諸侯，蔽忠塞賢，朝廷疾怨，諸侯皆有倍畔之意，人事極矣。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Yu shi da fu Cuo, ying huo tian zi, qin duo zhu hou, bi zhong sai xian, chao ting ji yuan, zhu hou jie have bei pan zhi yi, ren shi ji.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Imperial censor Chao Cuo, bewilders the emperor, invades feudal lords, blocks loyal secludes worthy, court hates resents, feudal lords all have rebellion intention, human affairs extreme.

sentences.zh: 彗星出，蝗蟲數起，此萬世一時，而愁勞聖人之所以起也。

translations.literal: Hui xing chu, huang chong shu qi, ci wan shi yi shi, er you lao sheng ren suo yi qi.
translations.idiomatic: Comet appears, locusts repeatedly arise, this ten thousand generations one time, moreover sorrow labors sage person arises reason.

sentences.zh: 故吳王欲內以晁錯為討，外隨大王後車，彷徉天下，所鄉者降，所指者下，天下莫敢不服。

translations.literal: Gu Wu wang yu nei yi Cuo wei tao, wai sui da wang hou che, pang yang tian xia, suo xiang zhe xiang, suo zhi zhe xia, tian xia mo gan bu fu.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the King of Wu wants internally with Cuo as target, externally follows your majesty's rear chariot, wandering the realm, where faces descend, where points submit, realm none dare not serve.

sentences.zh: 大王誠幸而許之一言，則吳王率楚王略函谷關，守滎陽敖倉之粟，距漢兵。

translations.literal: Da wang cheng xing er xu it yi yan, then Wu wang shuai Chu wang lue Han gu guan, shou Xing yang Ao cang zhi su, ju Han bing.
translations.idiomatic: If your majesty truly fortunate and permits one word, then the King of Wu will lead Chu king attack Hangu pass, guard Xingyang Aocang grain, resist Han troops.

sentences.zh: 治次舍，須大王。

translations.literal: Zhi ci she, xu da wang.
translations.idiomatic: Arrange secondary quarters, await your majesty.

sentences.zh: 大王有幸而臨之，則天下可并，兩主分割，不亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Da wang have xing er lin it, then tian xia ke bing, liang zhu fen ge, not yi ke hu?"

sentences.zh: 寡人素事南越三十餘年，其王君皆不辭分其卒以隨寡人，又可得三十餘萬。

translations.idiomatic: Therefore with rebellion as name, west together execute Cuo, restore old lands then stop.

sentences.zh: 方今計獨斬晁錯，發使赦吳楚七國，復其故削地，則兵可無血刃而俱罷。」

translations.literal: Fang jin ji du zhan Cuo, fa shi she Wu Chu qi guo, fu qi gu xue di, then bing ke wu xue ren er ju ba."
translations.idiomatic: Currently plan only behead Cuo, send envoys pardon Wu Chu seven kingdoms, restore their previously reduced lands, then troops can without bloodshed all stop."

translations.idiomatic: Dongyue troops able ten plus thousand people, then sent people gather scattered soldiers.

sentences.zh: 漢使人以利啗東越，東越即紿吳王，吳王出勞軍，即使人鏦殺吳王，盛其頭，馳傳以聞。

translations.literal: Han shi ren yi li dan Dong Yue, Dong Yue ji wei Wu wang, Wu wang chu lao jun, ji shi ren jin sha Wu wang, sheng qi tou, chi zhuan yi wen.
translations.idiomatic: Han sent people with profit entice Dongyue, Dongyue immediately tricked Wu king, Wu king came out comfort army, immediately sent people axe killed Wu king, put his head in basket, galloped relay to report.

sentences.zh: 吳王子子華、子駒亡走閩越。

translations.literal: Wu wang zi Zi Hua, Zi Ju wang zou Min Yue.
translations.idiomatic: Wu king sons Zi Hua, Zi Ju fled ran Minyue.

sentences.zh: 吳王之棄其軍亡也，軍遂潰，往往稍降太尉、梁軍。

translations.literal: Wu wang zhi qi qi jun wang ye, jun sui kui, wang wang shao xiang Tai wei, Liang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Wu king abandoned his army fled, army then collapsed, gradually surrendered Taiwei, Liang army.

sentences.zh: 楚王戊軍敗，自殺。

translations.literal: Chu wang Wu jun bai, zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Chu king Wu army defeated, suicide.

sentences.zh: 三王之圍齊臨菑也，三月不能下。

translations.literal: San wang zhi wei Qi Lin Zi ye, san yue bu neng xia.
translations.idiomatic: Three kings surrounded Qi Linzi, three months could not take.

sentences.zh: 漢兵至，膠西、膠東、菑川王各引兵歸。

translations.literal: Han bing zhi, Jiao xi, Jiao dong, Zi chuan wang ge yin bing gui.
translations.idiomatic: Han troops arrived, Jiaoxi, Jiaodong, Zichuan kings each led troops return.

sentences.zh: 膠西王乃袒跣，席槁，飲水，謝太后。

translations.literal: Jiao xi wang nai tan xian, xi gao, yin shui, xie tai hou.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi king then bared feet, sat on straw, drank water, apologized to empress dowager.

sentences.zh: 王太子德曰：「漢兵遠，臣觀之已罷，可襲，願收大王餘兵擊之，擊之不勝，乃逃入海，未晚也。」

translations.literal: Wang tai zi De yue: "Han bing yuan, chen guan zhi yi ba, ke xi, yuan shou da wang yu bing ji zhi, ji zhi bu sheng, nai tao ru hai, wei wan."
translations.idiomatic: King crown prince De said: "Han troops far, I observe them already tired, can attack, wish gather great king remaining troops attack them, attack not win, then flee enter sea, not late.

sentences.zh: 王曰：「吾士卒皆已壞，不可發用。」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Wu shi zu jie yi huai, bu ke fa yong."
translations.idiomatic: King said: "My soldiers all already damaged, cannot mobilize use."

sentences.zh: 弗聽。

translations.literal: Fu ting.
translations.idiomatic: Not listened.

sentences.zh: 漢將弓高侯穨當遺王書曰：「奉詔誅不義，降者赦其罪，復故；

translations.literal: Han jiang Gong gao hou Yi dang yi wang shu yue: "Feng zhao zhu bu yi, xiang zhe she qi zui, fu gu;
translations.idiomatic: Han general Gonggao marquis Yi Dang sent king letter: "Receive decree execute unrighteous, surrender pardon their crime, restore old;

sentences.zh: 不降者滅之。

translations.literal: Bu xiang zhe mie zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Not surrender exterminate them.

sentences.zh: 王何處，須以從事。」

translations.literal: Wang he chu, xu yi cong shi."
translations.idiomatic: King where go, wait to handle affairs."

sentences.zh: 王肉袒叩頭漢軍壁，謁曰：「臣卬奉法不謹，驚駭百姓，乃苦將軍遠道至于窮國，敢請菹醢之罪。」

translations.literal: Wang rou tan kou tou Han jun bi, ye yue: "Chen Ang feng fa bu jin, jing hai bai xing, nai ku jiang jun yuan dao zhi yu qiong guo, gan qing zu hai zhi zui."
translations.idiomatic: King bared flesh kowtowed Han army wall, audience said: "Subject Ang receive law not careful, startled terrified people, moreover toil general far road arrive poor kingdom, dare request pickle mince crime."

sentences.zh: 弓高侯執金鼓見之，曰：「王苦軍事，願聞王發兵狀。」

translations.literal: Gong gao hou zhi jin gu jian zhi, yue: "Wang ku jun shi, yuan wen wang fa bing zhuang."
translations.idiomatic: Gonggao marquis held gold drum saw him, said: "King toil military affairs, wish hear king send troops condition."

sentences.zh: 王頓首膝行對曰：「今者，晁錯天子用事臣，變更高皇帝法令，侵奪諸侯地。

translations.literal: Wang dun shou xi xing dui yue: "Jin zhe, Cuo tian zi yong shi chen, bian geng Gao huang di fa ling, qin duo zhu hou di.
translations.idiomatic: King kowtowed knee walked replied: "Now, Cuo emperor use affairs minister, changed high emperor laws commands, invaded seized feudal lords lands.

sentences.zh: 卬等以為不義，恐其敗亂天下，七國發兵，且以誅錯。

translations.literal: Ang deng yi wei bu yi, kong qi bai luan tian xia, qi guo fa bing, qie yi zhu Cuo.
translations.idiomatic: Ang etc. considered unrighteous, feared his defeat disorder realm, seven kingdoms sent troops, moreover to execute Cuo.

sentences.zh: 今聞錯已誅，卬等謹以罷兵歸。」

translations.literal: Jin wen Cuo yi zhu, Ang deng jin yi ba bing gui."
translations.idiomatic: Now heard Cuo already executed, Ang etc. respectfully stop troops return."

sentences.zh: 將軍曰：「王茍以錯不善，何不以聞？

translations.literal: Jiang jun yue: "Wang gou yi Cuo bu shan, he bu yi wen?
translations.idiomatic: General said: "King if with Cuo not good, why not report?

sentences.zh: （及）［乃］未有詔虎符，擅發兵擊義國。

translations.literal: (Ji) [Nai] wei you zhao hu fu, shan fa bing ji yi guo.
translations.idiomatic: Not have decree tiger tally, arbitrarily sent troops attack righteous states.

sentences.zh: 以此觀之，意非欲誅錯也。」

translations.literal: Yi ci guan zhi, yi fei yu zhu Cuo ye."
translations.idiomatic: With this view, intention not want execute Cuo."

sentences.zh: 乃出詔書為王讀之。

translations.literal: Nai chu zhao shu wei wang du zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Then took out decree document for king read it.

sentences.zh: 讀之訖，曰：「王其自圖。」

translations.literal: Du zhi ji, yue: "Wang qi zi tu."
translations.idiomatic: Read finished, said: "King himself plan."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「如卬等死有餘罪。」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Ru Ang deng si you yu zui."
translations.idiomatic: King said: "Like Ang etc. die have surplus crime."

sentences.zh: 遂自殺。

translations.literal: Sui zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Then suicide.

sentences.zh: 太后、太子皆死。

translations.literal: Tai hou, tai zi jie si.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager, crown prince all died.

sentences.zh: 膠東、菑川、濟南王皆死，國除，納于漢。

translations.literal: Jiao dong, Zi chuan, Ji nan wang jie si, guo chu, na yu Han.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaodong, Zichuan, Jinan kings all died, kingdoms removed, incorporated into Han.

sentences.zh: 酈將軍圍趙十月而下之，趙王自殺。

translations.literal: Li jiang jun wei Zhao shi yue er xia zhi, Zhao wang zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Li general surrounded Zhao ten months then took it, Zhao king suicide.

sentences.zh: 濟北王以劫故，得不誅，徙王菑川。

translations.literal: Ji bei wang yi jie gu, de bu zhu, yi wang Zi chuan.
translations.idiomatic: Jibei king because coercion reason, got not executed, moved king Zichuan.

sentences.zh: 初，吳王首反，并將楚兵，連齊趙。

translations.literal: Chu, Wu wang shou fan, bing jiang Chu bing, lian Qi Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Initially, Wu king first rebelled, united led Chu troops, connected Qi Zhao.

sentences.zh: 正月起兵，三月皆破，獨趙後下。

translations.literal: Zheng yue qi bing, san yue jie po, du Zhao hou xia.
translations.idiomatic: First month raised troops, three months all broken, only Zhao later surrendered.

sentences.zh: 復置元王少子平陸侯禮為楚王，續元王後。

translations.literal: Fu zhi Yuan wang shao zi Ping lu hou Li wei Chu wang, xu Yuan wang hou.
translations.idiomatic: Again established Yuan wang youngest son Pinglu marquis Li as Chu king, continued Yuan wang descendants.

sentences.zh: 徙汝南王非王吳故地，為江都王。

translations.literal: Yi Ru nan wang Fei wang Wu gu di, wei Jiang du wang.
translations.idiomatic: Moved Runan king Fei king Wu old lands, became Jiangdu king.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吳王之王，由父省也。

translations.literal: Tai shi gong yue: Wu wang zhi wang, you fu xing ye.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: Wu king enfeoffed king, by father merit.

sentences.zh: 能薄賦斂，使其眾，以擅山海利。

translations.literal: Neng bo fu lian, shi qi zhong, yi shan hai li.
translations.idiomatic: Able reduce taxes levies, command his multitude, monopolize mountain sea profits.

sentences.zh: 逆亂之萌，自其子興。

translations.literal: Ni luan zhi meng, zi qi zi xing.
translations.idiomatic: Contrary disorder sprouts, from his son arose.

sentences.zh: 爭技發難，卒亡其本；

translations.literal: Zheng ji fa nan, zu wang qi ben;
translations.idiomatic: Quarreled skill provoked difficulty, finally lost his foundation;

sentences.zh: 親越謀宗，竟以夷隕。

translations.literal: Qin Yue mou zong, jing yi yi yun.
translations.idiomatic: Relied Yue plotted clan, ultimately with barbarian perished.

sentences.zh: 晁錯為國遠慮，禍反近身。

translations.literal: Cuo wei guo yuan lv, huo fan jin shen.
translations.idiomatic: Cuo for state far consideration, calamity instead near body.

sentences.zh: 袁盎權說，初寵後辱。

translations.literal: Yuan Ang quan shuo, chu chong hou ru.
translations.idiomatic: Yuan Ang authority persuasion, initially favored later humiliated.

sentences.zh: 故古者諸侯地不過百里，山海不以封。

translations.literal: Gu gu zhe zhu hou di bu guo bai li, shan hai bu yi feng.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore ancient feudal lords lands not exceed hundred li, mountain sea not with enfeoff.

sentences.zh: 「毋親夷狄，以疏其屬」，蓋謂吳邪？

translations.literal: "Wu qin Yi Di, yi shu qi shu", gai wei Wu xie?
translations.idiomatic: "Do not be close Yi Di, to distance their branches", how speak Wu?

sentences.zh: 「毋為權首，反受其咎」，豈盎、錯邪？

translations.literal: "Wu wei quan shou, fan shou qi jiu", qi Ang, Cuo xie?
translations.idiomatic: "Do not be authority head, contrary receive their blame", how Ang, Cuo?
